description: This file defines an Angular component 'GameShellComponent' that manages the game UI, including menu visibility, game control actions, and interaction with game services such as menu and audio management.

classes.name: GameShellComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that serves as the main container for the game's UI, handling user interactions and delegating game state changes to injected services.

methods.name: ngAfterViewInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook called after the component's view has been fully initialized.

methods.name: onGameStart
methods.description: Starts the game by invoking the startGame methods on menu and game canvas services, and plays music if enabled.

methods.name: onGameRestart
methods.description: Restarts the game, resetting game state and controllers, and plays music if enabled.

methods.name: onShowInstructions
methods.description: Displays game instructions, plays menu select sound, and stops background music.

methods.name: onCloseInstructions
methods.description: Hides game instructions and plays menu back sound.

methods.name: onMuteToggle
methods.description: Toggles the mute state of the game's audio.
